#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int h[1003];
int lis[1003];
int n;
int c;

int main(){
	int tc;
	scanf("%d", &tc);
	while (tc--){
		scanf("%d", &n);
		for (int i=0; i<n; i++){
			scanf("%d", h+i);
		}
		c=1;
		lis[0]=h[0];
		for (int i=1; i<n; i++){
			int* u = upper_bound(lis, lis+c, h[i]);
			if (u==lis+c){
				//not found
				lis[c]=h[i];
				c++;
			} else {
				*u = h[i];
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n", c);
	}
	return 0;
}
